[Microsoft](https://www.linkedin.com/company/microsoft?trk=public_post_comment-text) deserves immense praise for advancing efforts like these, not only for the technical rigor but for the foresight they represent.

History teaches us that every leap in human capability; from the printing press to the internet, has carried both light and shadow.

AI has elevated intelligence itself, amplifying human creativity but also widening the avenues for misuse. The true test of wisdom in this era is not reactive defense, but the ability to remain several steps ahead of negative actors.

Systems must be recalibrated in real time, with screening and safeguards that adapt as quickly as AI generates new possibilities. Threat search can no longer be passive; it must be active, continuous, and anticipatory, catching risks before they are spotted by those who would exploit them.

This is the essence of responsible stewardship in the age of boundless possibility: foresight as defense, vigilance as innovation.
